article:
'Hybrid Recordings LLC' is a record label that is a division of Metropolitan
Talent, Inc., which is led by John Scher and Al Cafaro.

Hybrid Recordings recently announced a new worldwide distribution agreement with
SonyBMG's RED Distribution. Hybrid Recordings kicked off 2007 with Recollection,
the second release of folk rock group Assembly of Dust. Currently on the release
schedule is Johnette Napolitano with her newest solo record Scarred due in
stores May 29. In 2006, Hybrid released the first new album in 10 years from the
Gin Blossoms (Major Lodge Victory), Strays Don't Sleep (CD/DVD Pacakge), and Jen
Chapin (Ready). In 2005, Hybrid released All Hours' In Flgarante Delicto, The
Sound Of Urchin's The Diamond, Shake The Hand That Shook The World from Pepper's
Ghost, and Vertical Horizon's GO. Also on Hybrid's roster is Weir Here â The
Best of Bob Weir.
